code: import React from"react";import Chart from"./chart/chart";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ExpensesChart(props){var datapointsArray=[{label:"Jan",value:0},{label:"Feb",value:0},{label:"Mar",value:0},{label:"Apr",value:0},{label:"May",value:0},{label:"Jun",value:0},{label:"Jul",value:0},{label:"Aug",value:0},{label:"Sept",value:0},{label:"Oct",value:0},{label:"Nov",value:0},{label:"Dec",value:0}];props.expenses.map(function(ele){var eleMonth=new Date(ele.date).getMonth();datapointsArray[eleMonth].value+=ele.amount;return null;});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Chart,{datapoints:datapointsArray});}export default ExpensesChart;
